com.analog.lyric.dimple.model.transform

Class JunctionTreeTransformMap.AddedJointVariable<Var extends Variable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.analog.lyric.dimple.model.transform.JunctionTreeTransformMap.AddedJointVariable<Var>
  • Type Parameters:
    Var - specifies the variable type. Currently only Discrete is supported.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JunctionTreeTransformMap.AddedJointDiscreteVariable
    Enclosing class:
    JunctionTreeTransformMap

    public abstract static class JunctionTreeTransformMap.AddedJointVariable<Var extends Variable>
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a variable that joins two or more other variables along an edge between two factors in the target model to ensure that it is singly connected. There may be multiple such joined variables for the same set of underlying variables.
    Since:
    0.05
